nodes.text: The X5R heavy demolitions kit was a type of heavy carbo-plas case filled with precision timers, remote detonators, and other tools used by explosives experts, and they costed 1,000 credits per kit. In addition, X5R kits also contained a heavily shielded and signal-proof compartment large enough to store a half-dozen thermal detonators or a pair of larger demolition charges.

The tools within the kit were able to assist a user in setting or disarming explosives, and the precise measurements and modulation made possible by the equipment reduced the risk of errors. However, the kit required significant space and attention to use, which made it unwieldly.
The X5R heavy demolitions kit was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
